articles.title: FIFA WC qualifiers: Argentina concerned over Messi; Brazil bid for direct spot
articles.description: For front-running Brazil, the main aim this week is beating Colombia and securing an automatic spot at next year's World Cup in Qatar with plenty of time to spare in South American qualifying. For second-place Argentina, the bigger concern ahead of its trip to Uruguay is over the fitness of Messi.
articles.content: Follow us on Image Source : AP PHOTO/NATACHA PISARENKO Argentina's Lionel Messi, left, and Angel Di Maria, attend a team training session ahead of a FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 qualifier match against Uruguay in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Tuesday, Nov. 9... [4417 chars]

articles.title: Argentina forecasts 9% growth in 2021, up from previous 8% estimate
articles.description: Argentina's economy will grow 9% in 2021, recovering much of what it lost last year during the COVID-19 lockdown, the economy ministry said on Tuesday, raising its previous estimate of 8% growth this year.
